item.title: 2022 Predictions
item.description: Areas of Interest Continued demand for blockspace alt-L1 to L2 plays Income generation, incentive control (veNomics) Stablecoins a bear market for crypto is a bull market for stablecoins there will be regulatory headwinds… DAO experiments & Utility NFTs https://twitter.

item.title: 2022-02 Outlook
item.description: Personal Outlook: Cautiously Bearish, Waiting for Capitulation If you’re holding long-term and not over-leveraged, just sit tight, nothing to do except potentially buy a capitulation.

item.title: GameFi Notes
item.description: Sunflower Land https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land Metaverse P2E game that brought down the Polygon Network for a couple weeks Recent fork on Aurora also caused breaking network transaction for a while

item.title: Libraries

item.title: Personal Knowledge Management Systems
item.description: Desired Features WYSIWYG/Live Preview Editing Plugins (Integrations, Expansion) Attachments Selective Publishing Collaborative Features Existing Apps Open Source Logseq Pros Very Fast Cons Everything’s an outline Athens Research Similar to Logseq (Roam clone), but database based

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :) Quartz Documentation (this site!) Strengthening Online Social Bonds: Research Garden Jacky Zhao’s Garden Anson Yu’s Garden Shihyu’s PKM Chloe’s Garden SlRvb’s Site Course notes for Information Technology Advanced Theory If you want to see your own on here, submit a Pull Request adding yourself to this file !

item.title: Understanding Web3
item.description: What is Web3 (web3) The Web 3.0->Web3 we are talking about was originally coined by Gavin York (co-founder of Ethereum, now Parity/Polkadot) back in 2014, not to be confused with the Semantic Web - Web 3.
